name: Astro Vox 1 - 2 ep. - C64 game
description:
Astro Vox  1 & 2  - C64

Story:

Game two episodes 
(Two separate maps...the 1st episode to the vertical scroll and 2° of scroll 
horizontal) 
A classic game of shoot 'em ups, characterized by a graphics 
nothing short of psychedelic across alien worlds " - lit to 
neon" in environments with bright colors and at the same time 
pleasant. Welcome in "Astro Vox", where you will have to do 
with the alien super villains and combative "Voxarians" that 
would like to take over the earth and its resources...You have to 
go through their bases and defend yourself from their powerful 
weapons, pass tunnels and caverns, and be careful not to bang on 
rocks and their fortified buildings, be careful to the traps 
scattered throughout the various levels, collect bonuses and energy 
reach 10,000 points, you will conquer screw 
extra...Drive by Voxarians, which will be unleashed against the 
their ships and will turn their guns to defend against the 
your hunting...Reach the last level and destroy their 
boss, doing so sakverete the world from his 
destruction......Use the joystick in Port 2......choose if 
play with the music in the gameplay or in the fx sound by moving the 
joystick to the right or to the left (looking at the icon to the right in 
low)...Press FIRE to start your game......You can 
move your spaceship in the 8 direction and operate the laser, 
by pressing the Fire button of your joystick (connected to 
Port2 of the C64)......Good fight and good luck...!!! 

and above all, have fun with my C64 games ...!

Pinov Vox
